title: Is there a list of past Featured Typefaces?
content:
I'm trying to find a typeface that was the "featured font" for this site ~a year ago (it had a combination of egyptian and wedge serifs).

Is there a list of the typefaces featured on this site somewhere?
author: popluhv

comments.content:
That list is right here: [Featured Face](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013110245/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Featured%20Face)  
Cheers!
